title: Xanthi Cracking assembly
content:
On Sunday, February 18th, the annual report of cracking was held. As it enters its seventh year of operation, and after a serious decline in the period of pandemic, the crack seems to be going through a new period. This is shown by the operation of recent months and, in particular, its exploitation by youth. This was also certified by its last meeting.

A lot of new world, mainly students and students, but also older ones, quoted their concerns and thoughts in a living discussion. The new Management Committee as well as theater, cinema and book groups were formed, which operate openly and with their announcement. There have been various proposals for a multifaceted, wide, open and exterior operation of the crack and for actions in the coming days, which will be specified by the respective groups.

With the youth on the road to the race for a long time, the farmers in the blockage, the workers boiling with rage and the whole people to sigh in poverty and precision, places like cracking have a serious role in Social, cultural, political and ideological level, against a barbaric and rotten system and its political-ideological expressions.
author: geoxan
